desc: A clinically studied bacteria that reduces chronic inflammation and increases stress resistance. Natural medicine for everyday anxiety and depression.

layout.text:
Natural medicine for
anxiety, depression
and stress

aurum+ contains a clinically and scientifically studied strain of mycolicibacteria called Mycolicibacterium aurum Aogashima (M. aurum). M. aurum reduces chronic inflammation, increasing your body's stress resilience and coping abilities, while effectively reducing everyday anxiety, depression and stress to improve your overall mental health.*
